SELECT menu_code , menu_name , menu_price , category_code , orderable_status FROM tbl_menu
JOIN tbl_category USING(category_code)
WHERE orderable_status = 'Y'
AND menu_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ value }, '%')
AND category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ value }, '%')
ORDER BY menu_code

SELECT menu_code , menu_name , menu_price , category_code , orderable_status FROM tbl_menu WHERE orderable_status = 'Y'
AND category_code IN (4, 5, 6, 7)
AND category_code IN (8, 9, 10)
AND category_code IN (11, 12)
ORDER BY menu_code
